income_messages:
From: p***********************4@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-08-14 11:00:28
SUBJECT: Attn: This Email Owner,
Attn: This Email Owner,
In a matter of few minutes, confirm to us the authenticity or
otherwise of the claim that the owner of the above email Address is
dead of Cardiac attack necessitating the transfer of his Fifteen
Million,Seven hundred and fifty thousand U.S
Dollars($15,750,000.00)payment this morning as a "Gift Inheritance" to
Mark Berry of United States as backed up with a duly executed Deed of
assignment in his favor. But if the death claim is false, quickly send
a rebuttal to us through (
pspecialfraudunitfcidnig4@gmail.com
) with a
reconfirmation of your details as
follows:1)Your Full Name,
(2) Address, and (3) Working Telephone numbers. As soon as you have
sent that to us by email, then give me a brief call to confirm receipt
of the rebuttal or otherwise.
Yours Faithfully,
Barrister:
(FOR)  Maina. Umaru
Special Fraud Units (SFU),
13, Milverton Road, Ikoyi, Lagos, Nigeria
From: p***********************4@gmail.com
To: mk36387@m**************p
Time: 2022-08-15 13:13:45
SUBJECT: Re Acknowledgement) and so,do the needful
Attn: Rex,
 We acknowledge with rude shock your response . Even a phrase response
from you speaks volumes in this critical situation. Definitely, it
means that you are not dead contrary to the claim of your sudden death
from heart attack. It further means that you never assigned Fifteen
Million,Seven Hundred and Fifty Thousand U.S Dollars $15,750,000.00
inheritance payment  to the man--Mr. Mark Berry of United States. This
is a clear and shocking rebuttal which has actually moved our office
to have arrested Mr. Mark Berry immediately after your rebuttal for
prosecution for financial crimes and have in fact, commenced deep
investigations to unravel all those behind the fraud attempt for
appropriate legal sanctions. Nobody no matter how highly placed will
be spared in this mess. Of course, your rebuttal has put a definite
stop to his false information that you were dead.
Urgently therefore, send to us as earlier demanded,a reconfirmation of
your  full name ,Clear address and phone,(preferably Mobile) numbers,
for us to immediately  commence the mandatory legal process of
re-validation of your personal data  both at the federal Ministry of
Justice, Finance and Central Bank of Nigeria, which is the legal
condition prerequisite for the payment in your name again,since your
original information has been distorted by the criminals . Because of
the illegal attempt by Mr. Mark Berry of United States, to
fraudulently collect your US$15, 750, 000.00.payment, we feel
obligated to advise you to handle this matter confidentially to avoid
another attempt by anybody to tamper with your funds again. You are
very free to call me, Maina Umaru  Commissioner of Police, on phone at
any time for clarifications and /or updates.
Yours Faithfully,
Maina Umaru
Commissioner of Police,
 Special Fraud Unit, SFU,
13, Milverton Road, Ikoyi, Lagos, Nigeria
Direct Phone: +234 916 901 6828
From: p***********************4@gmail.com

SUBJECT: Re: Re Acknowledgement) and so,do the needful

Yours Faithfully,
